name: Gingerbread House Decorator (Sketchmas Day 1)
description:
Decorate a gingerbread house and take pictures of your delicious creation! This is a simple relaxing gingerbread house artmaking game.

Made in 11 hours for the 12 Days of Sketchmas Game Jam on Christmas Day. Day 1 theme: Creation.

Controls

ActionControlDecorateLeft Mouse ButtonEraseRight Mouse ButtonRotate CameraWASD keys or Arrow KeysQuitEscape key

Click in the toolbar on the top of the screen to change the decoration size and color.

Pictures are saved to the desktop. Make sure you refresh your desktop if the pictures do not appear.

Share/upload your creations in the comments!

Music: Happy Christmas Inspiring by WinnieTheMoog.  Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/7179-happy-christmas-inspiring. License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
